# File lib/grit/git-ruby/git_object.rb, line 23
    def initialize(str)
      @email = ''
      @date = Time.now
      @offset = 0

      m = /^(.*?) <(.*)> (\d+) ([+-])0*(\d+?)$/.match(str)
      if !m
        case str
        when /<.+>/
          m, @name, @email = *str.match(/(.*) <(.+?)>/)
        else
          @name = str
        end
      else
        @name = m[1]
        @email = m[2]
        @date = Time.at(Integer(m[3]))
        @offset = (m[4] == "-" ? -1 : 1)*Integer(m[5])
      end
    end
